com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class Margin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.Margin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Margin
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The margins to be used on a component.

    A default margin size can be set for "all" sides of the panel, or the specific margin sizes can be set for each side of the panel.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
